data.name: Little Islanders
data.detailed_description:
Little Islanders is currently in Pre-Alpha, Screenshots and Gameplay will change over development.

PLAY GOD OF THE ISLAND. HELP YOUR PEOPLE BUILD, SURVIVE, AND THRIVE.


Inspired by classic "god games" like Black & White and Populous, in this game YOU are the god of your Little Islanders.

Your Islanders are vulnerable to your power, and you must choose to become either a benevolent or malevolent force upon them. But whether good or evil, it is your duty to overcome the dangers of the Island, and your responsibility and purpose to help your people survive.

Outlast the elements. Survive the change in seasons. Fight supernatural enemies. Assign your settlers roles (like Builder, Farmer, Lumberjack, Worshipper, and more). Interact with your Islanders and the diverse world around them.

Be adored or feared. Good or evil. You are in control.


  • Every person is Unique and Important from their appearance to their traits, they can learn skills, can age, die and have their own family.
  • Help your people collect resources and build their settlement!
  • Enjoy bountiful harvests and also survive famine; plan ahead for poor crops or winter. Go through Surplus and Deficit periods!
  • Changing seasons; Seasons effect resource production.
  • Day and Night system, Make sure all your people are housed at night for their health and safety!
  • Protect your babies and children as they are the future of your people. Look after the Elderly too in their twilight years.
  • Set in a 2.5d low poly stylised world.

Fully Interactive and Dynamic World

Being the god in the realm, you have the ability to greatly effect the world, rip out trees, pick up boulders and cast powers. Spread fire and burn woodland or extinguish rampaging fires.

Blessings and Curses

Blessings or Curses can effect the skills and status of your people. Curses (like Sluggish) will reduce their speed of movement, Blessings (like Wished Luck) will increase their Luck stat.

Design, Build and Decorate

Design your villages and towns that the settlers can then construct, from roads and walls to houses and farms.

Settler Traits and Skills

Every person has unique skills and traits and over their lives they can level up their skills in Resource Production (Food, Gold, Wood etc...) or their Personal Skills (Intelligence, Strength, Speed).

Life and Progression for Settlers

Settlers can fulfil the basic roles necessary to maintain their community, However they can also be given "Divine Inspiration" to become Warriors or Mages. Mages can be sent into battle or be trained to augment the society, for example Agrimancers can distort their environment to grow food rapidly in all seasons. Pyromancers can use fire to attack enemies and defend your settlement.

Happiness is Important

If your people are miserably unhappy, they will not be as productive as they otherwise would be if they were happy. Happiness also effects the daily mana produced from night-time prayers of your people, a very happy populous will produce more mana. Mana is what gives you your power to influence the world.

data.short_description: Your people need you, and you've been summoned to protect and guide them in their time of need. You must help them settle the island that they now find themselves inhabiting. Help them build their town, protect them, and ensure that they thrive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 +
  • Processor: Intel i5 2015 Gen or Higher / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: At least 2GB GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: If you can run Unreal Engine 4 games, this should work too! üëç
